channel.title: CVE Feed for Spring -- Spring Web Services
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Spring -- Spring Web Services

item.title: CVE-2019-3773|2024-09-17T03:33:35.558Z -- spring -- spring%20web%20services
item.description: Spring Web Services, versions 2.4.3, 3.0.4, and older unsupported versions of all three projects, were susceptible to XML External Entity Injection (XXE) when receiving XML data from untrusted sources.
